What should I do with the downloaded Verus software?

Once you've downloaded the Verus software, you should unzip the compressed folder to a location on your computer where you can easily launch it from, such as your Desktop. It's a good idea to rename the folder to "Verus v<x>" where "<x>" is the current version, so you can keep track of which version you're running.

://veruscoin.io/#download
